record.field: AF | Patents, licenses, software, and similar rights
SYSCOHADA_AJ.gross + SYSCOHADA_AK.gross + SYSCOHADA_AL.gross + SYSCOHADA_AM.gross + SYSCOHADA_AN.gross + SYSCOHADA_AP.gross
SYSCOHADA_AJ.depr + SYSCOHADA_AK.depr + SYSCOHADA_AL.depr + SYSCOHADA_AM.depr + SYSCOHADA_AN.depr + SYSCOHADA_AP.depr
SYSCOHADA_AJ.balance + SYSCOHADA_AK.balance + SYSCOHADA_AL.balance + SYSCOHADA_AM.balance + SYSCOHADA_AN.balance + SYSCOHADA_AP.balance
AM | Equipment, furniture and biological assets
AP | Advances and deposits paid on fixed assets
BS | Banks, postal cheques, cash registers and similar
CJ | Net income for the year
CP | TOTAL EQUITY AND SIMILAR RESOURCES (I)
SYSCOHADA_CA.gross + SYSCOHADA_CB.gross + SYSCOHADA_CD.gross + SYSCOHADA_CE.gross + SYSCOHADA_CF.gross + SYSCOHADA_CG.gross + SYSCOHADA_CH.gross + SYSCOHADA_CL.gross + SYSCOHADA_CM.gross

SYSCOHADA_CA.balance + SYSCOHADA_CB.balance + SYSCOHADA_CD.balance + SYSCOHADA_CE.balance + SYSCOHADA_CF.balance + SYSCOHADA_CG.balance + SYSCOHADA_CH.balance + SYSCOHADA_CJ.balance + SYSCOHADA_CL.balance + SYSCOHADA_CM.balance
DA | Borrowings and other financial liabilities
DC | Financial provision for risks and expenses
DD | TOTAL FINANCIAL LIABILITIES AND SIMILAR RESOURCES (II)
DK | Tax and social security liabilities
SYSCOHADA_DH.gross + SYSCOHADA_DI.gross + SYSCOHADA_DJ.gross + SYSCOHADA_DK.gross + SYSCOHADA_DM.gross + SYSCOHADA_DN.gross
SYSCOHADA_DH.balance + SYSCOHADA_DI.balance + SYSCOHADA_DJ.balance + SYSCOHADA_DK.balance + SYSCOHADA_DM.balance + SYSCOHADA_DN.balance
DQ | Banks, discount and treasury credits
DR | Banks, financial institutions and treasury credits
